languages.text: На корабле Лорд-капитана обитает существо по имени Номос. Оно не в полной мере осознает, чем оно является, однако хочет жить и пребывать в дружбе с обитателями корабля.

traits.locale_text: На корабле Лорда-капитана обитает существо по имени Номос. Оно не в полной мере осознает, чем оно является, однако хочет жить и пребывать в дружбе с обитателями корабля.

languages.text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.
languages.original_text: На корабле Лорд-капитана обитает существо по имени Номос. Оно не в полной мере осознает, чем оно является, однако хочет жить и пребывать в дружбе с обитателями корабля.

traits.locale_text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.
An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.
An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.
An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.

languages.text: 某个名叫“诺莫斯”的生物正住在领主舰长的船上。它完全不知道自己是什么东西，但它希望能活下去，也希望能与船上的其他船员友好相处。
languages.original_text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: 某个名叫“诺莫斯”的生物正住在领主舰长的船上。它完全不知道自己是什么东西，但它希望能活下去，也希望能与船上的其他船员友好相处。

languages.text: ノモスと呼ばれる存在がロード・キャプテンの船に生息している。その生き物自身、自分が何であるかを完全には理解していないものの、生きたいと望んでおり、船の他の住人たちと友好的な関係を築きたいと考えている。
languages.original_text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: ノモスと呼ばれる存在がロード・キャプテンの船に生息している。その生き物自身、自分が何であるかを完全には理解していないものの、生きたいと望んでおり、船の他の住人たちと友好的な関係を築きたいと考えている。

languages.text: Una entidad llamada Nomos mora en la nave de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. No sabe con certeza qué clase de existencia es, pero quiere vivir y estar en paz con los demás habitantes de la nave.
languages.original_text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Una entidad llamada Nomos mora en la nave de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. No sabe con certeza qué clase de existencia es, pero quiere vivir y estar en paz con los demás habitantes de la nave.

languages.text: Eine Wesenheit namens Nomos lebt auf dem Schiff des Lord Captains. Sie ist sich nicht gänzlich bewusst, was sie ist, möchte aber einvernehmlich mit den anderen Bewohnern des Schiffes leben.
languages.original_text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Eine Wesenheit namens Nomos lebt auf dem Schiff des Lord Captains. Sie ist sich nicht gänzlich bewusst, was sie ist, möchte aber einvernehmlich mit den anderen Bewohnern des Schiffes leben.

languages.text: Une entité appelée Nomos a trouvé refuge dans le vaisseau du capitaine. Cette créature n'est pas tout à fait certaine de ce qu'elle est, mais elle désire vivre en harmonie avec les autres occupants du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Une entité appelée Nomos a trouvé refuge dans le vaisseau du capitaine. Cette créature n'est pas tout à fait certaine de ce qu'elle est, mais elle désire vivre en harmonie avec les autres occupants du vaisseau.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın gemisinde Nomos isimli bir varlık bulunuyor. Ne olduğunun tam olarak farkında değil ancak yaşamını devam ettirmek ve gemi sakinleriyle dostane ilişkiler yürütmek istiyor.
languages.original_text: An entity called Nomos is inhabiting the Lord Captain's ship. It is not fully aware of what it is, but it wants to live and to be on amicable terms with the ship's other inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın gemisinde Nomos isimli bir varlık bulunuyor. Ne olduğunun tam olarak farkında değil ancak yaşamını devam ettirmek ve geminin diğer sakinleriyle dostane bir ilişki içinde olmak istiyor.
